actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require hospitals and critical access hospitals, as a condition of participation under the medicare program, to meet certain requirements in order to advertise that the hospital has the capability of addressing emergency and acute coronary syndromes.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Heart Attack Safety Act of 2005 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require hospitals and critical access hospitals, as a condition of participation under the Medicare program, to meet certain requirements in order to advertise that the hospital has the capability of addressing emergency and acute coronary syndromes.
